page.title: 20LIVING IN GREAT BARR-Emma
page.content: My name is Emma Lewins and I live in Great Barr.I like living in Great Barr because my mom and dad run a shop.We live above the shop.I don't like living in Great Barr for a few reasons:one because you have to do hard work.Two, there is hardly anywhere to play out.Three, it is by a main road,and my brother keeps going on about cars.There is a row of shops along on the same side.There is also another row of shops on the other side.The road I live on is the Walsall Road.Next to the Walsall Road are four roads.One is Queslett then there is one called Calshot and there is also two other roads but I can't remember their names.Also next to us is the motorway.
